column5: In my opinion, I had a great last kick at the can playing the chase game this week. Truly enjoyed  my time out this week. One could not ask for better conditions to be floating out on a toon. Next Saturday is the closer on Simcoe for these fish. I,ll pass on that and go play with some fall bass and look for some fall perch. Thats if fall ever gets here. My goodness. It was 28 deg by 10:30 this morning. Any other time, I would be wearing my neoprene's and a hoodie out there.  The season opens up Jan 1st. Lots of other fish to chase til then,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,

You must really be upset Brian - this got posted twice just a minute apart.  Glad you had a great season though!  New place has unlimited internet so now I can spend the winter watching your videos.  Michael
I have been enjoying your posts all summer . What now
he has taking up singing just watch for his youtube channel, "Brians Song"  its been a fun summer
I have been enjoying your posts all summer . What now  Until the real fall gets here, I,ll be bowling the flats for smallies,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,

he has taking up singing just watch for his youtube channel, "Brians Song"  its been a fun summer   That it has been bud. I think I missed 2-3 days, weekends that is, all summer, I didnt fish. I can say though, I could take this weekday fishing, anytime soon. I know you will be there sooner then I. LOL
